messages.content: As your Member of Parliament my only job will be representing you at all levels of government. Like many of you working in London, I won't need a second home paid for by taxpayers.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Paul Greenwood emphasizes resolving the financial situation in an equitable way, ensuring confidence and respect among the business community without reverting to high lending rates.

issues.economy: Resolve the financial situation equitably while maintaining confidence and respect in the business market.

leaflet.personalStatement: My only job will be representing you at all levels of government. Like many of you working in London, I won't need a second home paid for by taxpayers.

images.caption: Fairness for all in Runnymede & Weybridge
